item.title: About
item.description: Hi there My name is Samuel Horovatin and I’m the proud owner of this site! I have made this as a mixture blog/portfolio/resume. I am currently working at Andgo Systems as a product specialist. I have a strong background in bioinformatics and software development, working having a specific interest in Nanopore Sequencers. Previously, I completed a Bachelor of Science Honours degree in Computer Science at the University of Saskatchewan in April, 2020.
